short_definition: The name given to any agreement made by the attorneys engaged on opposite sides of a cause, especially in writing, regulating any matter incidental to the proceedings or trial which falls within their jurisdiction.
long_definition_html: The name given to any agreement made by the attorneys engaged on opposite sides of a cause, especially in writing, regulating any matter incidental to the proceedings or trial which falls within their jurisdiction.
